body: "It seems I just landed a 'Super Effective' hit on you, Fuuro-San..." immediate 10/10.
Really like this art style, but the doujin is a bit cluttered and pretty hard to focus on one thing
Skyla is the fucking best. Been my favourite since childhood.
Fuck yeah! I've been super into Pokémon BW recently, and Skyla is one of the hottest of the many hot girls of Unova
